children.name: according
children.sourceText: And blessed be he that shall bring this thing to light; for it shall be brought out of darkness unto light, according to the word of God; yea, it shall be brought out of the earth, and it shall shine forth out of darkness, and come unto the knowledge of the people; and it shall be done by the power of God.

children.name: inasmuch
children.sourceText: And the people began to repent of their iniquity; and inasmuch as they did the Lord did have mercy on them.

children.name: insomuch
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that he begat sons and daughters, among whom were Esrom and Coriantumr; And they were exceedingly angry because of the doings of Jared their brother, insomuch that they did raise an army and gave battle unto Jared.

children.name: thyself
children.sourceText: For thus didst thou manifest thyself unto thy disciples; for after they had faith, and did speak in thy name, thou didst show thyself unto them in great power.

children.name: a
children.sourceText: Written to the Lamanites, who are a remnant of the house of Israel; and also to Jew and Gentile.

children.name: aboard
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that when they had prepared all manner of food, that thereby they might subsist upon the water, and also food for their flocks and herds, and whatsoever beast or animal or fowl that they should carry with them, and it came to pass that when they had done all these things they got aboard of their vessels or barges, and set forth into the sea, commending themselves unto the Lord their God.

children.name: about
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that when they were buried in the deep there was no water that could hurt them, their vessels being tight like unto a dish, and also they were tight like unto the ark of Noah; therefore when they were encompassed about by many waters they did cry unto the Lord, and he did bring them forth again upon the top of the waters.

children.name: above
children.sourceText: And the Lord would not suffer that they should stop beyond the sea in the wilderness, but he would that they should come forth even unto the land of promise, which was choice above all other lands, which the Lord God had preserved for a righteous people.

children.name: across
children.sourceText: And there were no more wars in the days of Shule; and he remembered the great things that the Lord had done for his fathers in bringing them across the great deep into the promised land; wherefore he did execute judgment in righteousness all his days.

children.name: after
children.sourceText: And now it came to pass that after the great and tremendous battle at Cumorah, behold, the Nephites who had escaped into the country southward were hunted by the Lamanites, until they were all destroyed.

children.name: all
children.sourceText: And also to the convincing of the Jew and Gentile that Jesus is the Christ, the Eternal God, manifesting himself unto all nations.

children.name: among
children.sourceText: Behold, the Lord hath shown unto me great and marvelous things concerning that which must shortly come, at that day when these things shall come forth among you.

children.name: an
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: another
children.sourceText: And behold also, the Lamanites are at war one with another; and the whole face of this land is one continual round of murder and bloodshed; and no one knoweth the end of the war.

children.name: any
children.sourceText: Behold, the sword of vengeance hangeth over you; and the time soon cometh that he avengeth the blood of the saints upon you, for he will not suffer their cries any longer.

children.name: anything
children.sourceText: For he had said unto him in times before, that if he would believe in him that he could show unto him all things, it should be shown unto him; therefore the Lord could not withhold anything from him, for he knew that the Lord could show him all things.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: Yea, behold I say unto you, that those saints who have gone before me, who have possessed this land, shall cry, yea, even from the dust will they cry unto the Lord; and as the Lord liveth he will remember the covenant which he hath made with them.

children.name: at
children.sourceText: An abridgment taken from the book of Ether also, which is a record of the people of Jared, who were scattered at the time the Lord confounded the language of the people, when they were building a tower to get to heaven.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: And whoso receiveth this record, and shall not condemn it because of the imperfections which are in it, the same shall know of greater things than these.

children.name: before
children.sourceText: Yea, behold I say unto you, that those saints who have gone before me, who have possessed this land, shall cry, yea, even from the dust will they cry unto the Lord; and as the Lord liveth he will remember the covenant which he hath made with them.

children.name: between
children.sourceText: And there began to be a war between the sons of Akish and Akish, which lasted for the space of many years, yea, unto the destruction of nearly all the people of the kingdom, yea, even all, save it were thirty souls, and they who fled with the house of Omer.

children.name: beyond
children.sourceText: And the Lord would not suffer that they should stop beyond the sea in the wilderness, but he would that they should come forth even unto the land of promise, which was choice above all other lands, which the Lord God had preserved for a righteous people.

children.name: but
children.sourceText: Behold, I have but few things to write, which things I have been commanded by my father.

children.name: by
children.sourceText: Written by way of commandment, and also by the spirit of prophecy and of revelation.

children.name: can
children.sourceText: For none can have power to bring it to light save it be given him of God; for God wills that it shall be done with an eye single to his glory, or the welfare of the ancient and long dispersed covenant people of the Lord.

children.name: concerning
children.sourceText: And now, behold, I say no more concerning them, for there are none save it be the Lamanites and robbers that do exist upon the face of the land.

children.name: could
children.sourceText: And he knoweth their faith, for in his name could they remove mountains; and in his name could they cause the earth to shake; and by the power of his word did they cause prisons to tumble to the earth; yea, even the fiery furnace could not harm them, neither wild beasts nor poisonous serpents, because of the power of his word.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: And behold, the Lamanites have hunted my people, the Nephites, down from city to city and from place to place, even until they are no more; and great has been their fall; yea, great and marvelous is the destruction of my people, the Nephites.

children.name: during
children.sourceText: And he reigned over the half of the kingdom forty and two years; and he went to battle against the king, Amgid, and they fought for the space of many years, during which time Com gained power over Amgid, and obtained power over the remainder of the kingdom.

children.name: except
children.sourceText: saith Jesus Christ; And now I, Moroni, have written the words which were commanded me, according to my memory; and I have told you the things which I have sealed up; therefore touch them not in order that ye may translate; for that thing is forbidden you, except by and by it shall be wisdom in God.

children.name: few
children.sourceText: Behold, I have but few things to write, which things I have been commanded by my father.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: Which is to show unto the remnant of the house of Israel what great things the Lord hath done for their fathers; and that they may know the covenants of the Lord, that they are not cast off forever.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: An abridgment taken from the book of Ether also, which is a record of the people of Jared, who were scattered at the time the Lord confounded the language of the people, when they were building a tower to get to heaven.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: Behold, my father hath made this record, and he hath written the intent thereof.

children.name: her
children.sourceText: Now the daughter of Jared being exceedingly expert, and seeing the sorrows of her father, thought to devise a plan whereby she could redeem the kingdom unto her father.

children.name: him
children.sourceText: For he truly saith that no one shall have them to get gain; but the record thereof is of great worth; and whoso shall bring it to light, him will the Lord bless.

children.name: himself
children.sourceText: And also to the convincing of the Jew and Gentile that Jesus is the Christ, the Eternal God, manifesting himself unto all nations.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: For none can have power to bring it to light save it be given him of God; for God wills that it shall be done with an eye single to his glory, or the welfare of the ancient and long dispersed covenant people of the Lord.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: Behold I, Moroni, do finish the record of my father, Mormon.

children.name: if
children.sourceText: And now, if there be faults they are the mistakes of men; wherefore, condemn not the things of God, that ye may be found spotless at the judgment-seat of Christ.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: Sealed by the hand of Moroni, and hid up unto the Lord, to come forth in due time by way of the Gentile.

children.name: into
children.sourceText: And now it came to pass that after the great and tremendous battle at Cumorah, behold, the Nephites who had escaped into the country southward were hunted by the Lamanites, until they were all destroyed.

children.name: it
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: its
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that the brother of Jared, (now the number of the vessels which had been prepared was eight) went forth unto the mount, which they called the mount Shelem, because of its exceeding height, and did molten out of a rock sixteen small stones; and they were white and clear, even as transparent glass; and he did carry them in his hands upon the top of the mount, and cried again unto the Lord, saying:

children.name: lest
children.sourceText: But behold, we know no fault; nevertheless God knoweth all things; therefore, he that condemneth, let him be aware lest he shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: like
children.sourceText: And they were small, and they were light upon the water, even like unto the lightness of a fowl upon the water.

children.name: many
children.sourceText: Yea, it shall come in a day when there shall be great pollutions upon the face of the earth; there shall be murders, and robbing, and lying, and deceivings, and whoredoms, and all manner of abominations; when there shall be many who will say, Do this, or do that, and it mattereth not, for the Lord will uphold such at the last day.

children.name: may
children.sourceText: Which is to show unto the remnant of the house of Israel what great things the Lord hath done for their fathers; and that they may know the covenants of the Lord, that they are not cast off forever.

children.name: me
children.sourceText: And whether they will slay me, I know not.

children.name: might
children.sourceText: Written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they might not be destroyed.

children.name: mine
children.sourceText: Behold what the scripture says, man shall not smite, neither shall he judge; for judgment is mine, saith the Lord, and vengeance is mine also, and I will repay.

children.name: most
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that they formed a secret combination, even as they of old; which combination is most abominable and wicked above all, in the sight of God; For the Lord worketh not in secret combinations, neither doth he will that man should shed blood, but in all things hath forbidden it, from the beginning of man.

children.name: must
children.sourceText: Behold, look ye unto the revelations of God; for behold, the time cometh at that day when all these things must be fulfilled.

children.name: my
children.sourceText: Behold I, Moroni, do finish the record of my father, Mormon.

children.name: myself
children.sourceText: Now I, Moroni, after having made an end of abridging the account of the people of Jared, I had supposed not to have written more, but I have not as yet perished; and I make not myself known to the Lamanites lest they should destroy me.

children.name: near
children.sourceText: Now the land of Moron, where the king dwelt, was near the land which is called Desolation by the Nephites.

children.name: neither
children.sourceText: Behold what the scripture says, man shall not smite, neither shall he judge; for judgment is mine, saith the Lord, and vengeance is mine also, and I will repay.

children.name: nevertheless
children.sourceText: But behold, we know no fault; nevertheless God knoweth all things; therefore, he that condemneth, let him be aware lest he shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: none
children.sourceText: And behold, I would write it also if I had room upon the plates, but I have not; and ore I have none, for I am alone.

children.name: nor
children.sourceText: My father hath been slain in battle, and all my kinsfolk, and I have not friends nor whither to go; and how long the Lord will suffer that I may live I know not.

children.name: nothing
children.sourceText: Behold, I say unto you that whoso believeth in Christ, doubting nothing, whatsoever he shall ask the Father in the name of Christ it shall be granted him; and this promise is unto all, even unto the ends of the earth.

children.name: o
children.sourceText: O ye wicked and perverse and stiffnecked people, why have ye built up churches unto yourselves to get gain?

children.name: of
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: off
children.sourceText: Which is to show unto the remnant of the house of Israel what great things the Lord hath done for their fathers; and that they may know the covenants of the Lord, that they are not cast off forever.

children.name: on
children.sourceText: We will destroy the work of the Lord, and the Lord will not remember his covenant which he hath made unto the house of Israel, the same is in danger to be hewn down and cast into the fire; For the eternal purposes of the Lord shall roll on, until all his promises shall be fulfilled.

children.name: one
children.sourceText: And behold also, the Lamanites are at war one with another; and the whole face of this land is one continual round of murder and bloodshed; and no one knoweth the end of the war.

children.name: or
children.sourceText: For none can have power to bring it to light save it be given him of God; for God wills that it shall be done with an eye single to his glory, or the welfare of the ancient and long dispersed covenant people of the Lord.

children.name: other
children.sourceText: But the Lord knoweth the things which we have written, and also that none other people knoweth our language; and because that none other people knoweth our language, therefore he hath prepared means for the interpretation thereof.

children.name: our
children.sourceText: Behold, four hundred years have passed away since the coming of our Lord and Savior.

children.name: out
children.sourceText: And blessed be he that shall bring this thing to light; for it shall be brought out of darkness unto light, according to the word of God; yea, it shall be brought out of the earth, and it shall shine forth out of darkness, and come unto the knowledge of the people; and it shall be done by the power of God.

children.name: over
children.sourceText: Behold, the sword of vengeance hangeth over you; and the time soon cometh that he avengeth the blood of the saints upon you, for he will not suffer their cries any longer.

children.name: rather
children.sourceText: Condemn me not because of mine imperfection, neither my father, because of his imperfection, neither them who have written before him; but rather give thanks unto God that he hath made manifest unto you our imperfections, that ye may learn to be more wise than we have been.

children.name: round
children.sourceText: And behold also, the Lamanites are at war one with another; and the whole face of this land is one continual round of murder and bloodshed; and no one knoweth the end of the war.

children.name: save
children.sourceText: And now, behold, I say no more concerning them, for there are none save it be the Lamanites and robbers that do exist upon the face of the land.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: And whoso receiveth this record, and shall not condemn it because of the imperfections which are in it, the same shall know of greater things than these.

children.name: she
children.sourceText: Now the daughter of Jared being exceedingly expert, and seeing the sorrows of her father, thought to devise a plan whereby she could redeem the kingdom unto her father.

children.name: should
children.sourceText: And behold, their prayers were also in behalf of him that the Lord should suffer to bring these things forth.

children.name: since
children.sourceText: Behold, four hundred years have passed away since the coming of our Lord and Savior.

children.name: so
children.sourceText: And there are none that do know the true God save it be the disciples of Jesus, who did tarry in the land until the wickedness of the people was so great that the Lord would not suffer them to remain with the people; and whether they be upon the face of the land no man knoweth.

children.name: some
children.sourceText: And Kib was the son of Orihah, who was the son of Jared; Which Jared came forth with his brother and their families, with some others and their families, from the great tower, at the time the Lord confounded the language of the people, and swore in his wrath that they should be scattered upon all the face of the earth; and according to the word of the Lord the people were scattered.

children.name: such
children.sourceText: Yea, it shall come in a day when there shall be great pollutions upon the face of the earth; there shall be murders, and robbing, and lying, and deceivings, and whoredoms, and all manner of abominations; when there shall be many who will say, Do this, or do that, and it mattereth not, for the Lord will uphold such at the last day.

children.name: than
children.sourceText: And whoso receiveth this record, and shall not condemn it because of the imperfections which are in it, the same shall know of greater things than these.

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they might not be destroyed.

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: And awake, and arise from the dust, O Jerusalem; yea, and put on thy beautiful garments, O daughter of Zion; and strengthen thy stakes and enlarge thy borders forever, that thou mayest no more be confounded, that the covenants of the Eternal Father which he hath made unto thee, O house of Israel, may be fulfilled.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Which is to show unto the remnant of the house of Israel what great things the Lord hath done for their fathers; and that they may know the covenants of the Lord, that they are not cast off forever.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: And my father also was killed by them, and I even remain alone to write the sad tale of the destruction of my people.

children.name: themselves
children.sourceText: And I know that ye do walk in the pride of your hearts; and there are none save a few only who do not lift themselves up in the pride of their hearts, unto the wearing of very fine apparel, unto envying, and strifes, and malice, and persecutions, and all manner of iniquities; and your churches, yea, even every one, have become polluted because of the pride of your hearts.

children.name: there
children.sourceText: And now, if there be faults they are the mistakes of men; wherefore, condemn not the things of God, that ye may be found spotless at the judgment-seat of Christ.

children.name: therefore
children.sourceText: Therefore I will write and hide up the records in the earth; and whither I go it mattereth not.

children.name: these
children.sourceText: And whoso receiveth this record, and shall not condemn it because of the imperfections which are in it, the same shall know of greater things than these.

children.name: they
children.sourceText: Written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they might not be destroyed.

children.name: this
children.sourceText: Behold, my father hath made this record, and he hath written the intent thereof.

children.name: those
children.sourceText: Yea, behold I say unto you, that those saints who have gone before me, who have possessed this land, shall cry, yea, even from the dust will they cry unto the Lord; and as the Lord liveth he will remember the covenant which he hath made with them.

children.name: thou
children.sourceText: Lord, the Gentiles will mock at these things, because of our weakness in writing; for Lord thou hast made us mighty in word by faith, but thou hast not made us mighty in writing; for thou hast made all this people that they could speak much, because of the Holy Ghost which thou hast given them; And thou hast made us that we could write but little, because of the awkwardness of our hands.

children.name: though
children.sourceText: Behold, I speak unto you as though I spake from the dead; for I know that ye shall have my words.

children.name: through
children.sourceText: And may the Lord Jesus Christ grant that their prayers may be answered according to their faith; and may God the Father remember the covenant which he hath made with the house of Israel; and may he bless them forever, through faith on the name of Jesus Christ.

children.name: throughout
children.sourceText: And he did execute a law throughout all the land, which gave power unto the prophets that they should go whithersoever they would; and by this cause the people were brought unto repentance.

children.name: thus
children.sourceText: For behold, thus said Jesus Christ, the Son of God, unto his disciples who should tarry, yea, and also to all his disciples, in the hearing of the multitude:

children.name: thy
children.sourceText: O Lord, thy righteous will be done, for I know that thou workest unto the children of men according to their faith; For the brother of Jared said unto the mountain Zerin, Remove, and it was removed.

children.name: to
children.sourceText: Written to the Lamanites, who are a remnant of the house of Israel; and also to Jew and Gentile.

children.name: towards
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that the Lord God caused that there should be a furious wind blow upon the face of the waters, towards the promised land; and thus they were tossed upon the waves of the sea before the wind.

children.name: under
children.sourceText: Do ye suppose that ye shall dwell with him under a consciousness of your guilt?

children.name: until
children.sourceText: And now it came to pass that after the great and tremendous battle at Cumorah, behold, the Nephites who had escaped into the country southward were hunted by the Lamanites, until they were all destroyed.

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: Written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they might not be destroyed.

children.name: up
children.sourceText: Written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they might not be destroyed.

children.name: upon
children.sourceText: And behold, I would write it also if I had room upon the plates, but I have not; and ore I have none, for I am alone.

children.name: us
children.sourceText: But behold, my father and I have seen them, and they have ministered unto us.

children.name: we
children.sourceText: But behold, we know no fault; nevertheless God knoweth all things; therefore, he that condemneth, let him be aware lest he shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: what
children.sourceText: Which is to show unto the remnant of the house of Israel what great things the Lord hath done for their fathers; and that they may know the covenants of the Lord, that they are not cast off forever.

children.name: whatsoever
children.sourceText: Behold, I say unto you that whoso believeth in Christ, doubting nothing, whatsoever he shall ask the Father in the name of Christ it shall be granted him; and this promise is unto all, even unto the ends of the earth.

children.name: wherefore
children.sourceText: Wherefore, it is an abridgment of the record of the people of Nephi, and also of the Lamanites.

children.name: whether
children.sourceText: And whether they will slay me, I know not.

children.name: which
children.sourceText: An abridgment taken from the book of Ether also, which is a record of the people of Jared, who were scattered at the time the Lord confounded the language of the people, when they were building a tower to get to heaven.

children.name: while
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that the wind did never cease to blow towards the promised land while they were upon the waters; and thus they were driven forth before the wind.

children.name: who
children.sourceText: Written to the Lamanites, who are a remnant of the house of Israel; and also to Jew and Gentile.

children.name: whom
children.sourceText: And now, if ye have imagined up unto yourselves a god who doth vary, and in whom there is shadow of changing, then have ye imagined up unto yourselves a god who is not a God of miracles.

children.name: whose
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that Orihah did execute judgment upon the land in righteousness all his days, whose days were exceedingly many.

children.name: whoso
children.sourceText: And whoso receiveth this record, and shall not condemn it because of the imperfections which are in it, the same shall know of greater things than these.

children.name: will
children.sourceText: And whether they will slay me, I know not.

children.name: with
children.sourceText: And behold also, the Lamanites are at war one with another; and the whole face of this land is one continual round of murder and bloodshed; and no one knoweth the end of the war.

children.name: within
children.sourceText: And because of the knowledge of this man he could not be kept from beholding within the veil; and he saw the finger of Jesus, which, when he saw, he fell with fear; for he knew that it was the finger of the Lord; and he had faith no longer, for he knew, nothing doubting.

children.name: without
children.sourceText: And after the brother of Jared had beheld the finger of the Lord, because of the promise which the brother of Jared had obtained by faith, the Lord could not withhold anything from his sight; wherefore he showed him all things, for he could no longer be kept without the veil.

children.name: would
children.sourceText: And behold, I would write it also if I had room upon the plates, but I have not; and ore I have none, for I am alone.

children.name: ye
children.sourceText: And now, if there be faults they are the mistakes of men; wherefore, condemn not the things of God, that ye may be found spotless at the judgment-seat of Christ.

children.name: yea
children.sourceText: And behold, the Lamanites have hunted my people, the Nephites, down from city to city and from place to place, even until they are no more; and great has been their fall; yea, great and marvelous is the destruction of my people, the Nephites.

children.name: yet
children.sourceText: Behold, I speak unto you as if ye were present, and yet ye are not.

children.name: you
children.sourceText: Behold, I am Moroni; and were it possible, I would make all things known unto you.

children.name: your
children.sourceText: Come unto me, and for your money you shall be forgiven of your sins.
